alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rush (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:48PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rush and southwestern Henry Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1248 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Rushville, or 17 miles west of Cambridge City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Rush and southwestern Henry Counties, including the following locations... Dunreith, Mays, Knightstown, Lewisville and Carthage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
